comments.body: also, add an unhealthy effect when you eat eight cookies in one go without your hunger bar going full before you eat all 8 cookies.
add throwable tnt, flattening tnt, and warden tnt
warden tnt is crafted from 4 warden torsos and 1 normal tnt, and throwable tnt is crafted from 2 normal tnt

put icons on potion types, add pig orb ore, raw and cooked pork heads (dropped from pigs using fortune sword), and you can make pig portal frames or insert pig orbs into pig heads to eat or to activate the pig portal to the pig dimension, which have pigs as the sole residents and pork blocks all over, either cooked or raw. make the ancient city portal activatable with heart of the deep (dropped from warden), and the otherside dimension where there is so many sculk.
iron golems now attack any hostile mob, including creepers

A moderation system that gives and takes Minecoins, and gives achievements. With the new moderation system, give Rakxn and Banana73620 18000 minecoins and every achievement for this thankful request. How did we get here, a furious cocktail, when pigs end (cook a pig over an end portal) etc. are coming to bedrock. Make a cooler anti-piracy screen.
when you respawn the ender dragon endermen stop crying
end cities now cap at y = 230

add ender torches, ender lanterns, ender sand, copper fire, copper campfires, ender campfires, ender lava, and the ender shores biome

new structures: your ender neighborhood (end villages), end shipwrecks

new items: copper spear, bedrock horse armor, bedrock nautilus armor, howdah (for camels and elephants)

new mob: elephant (carries 8 chests per side, mounts up to four players, found in savanna biome, drops ivory used for upgrading gear), it can store water in its trunk, and it can be used to farm obsidian near lava pits and fill pools.

new weapon: boomerang (comes in eight variants; wooden, stone, iron, gold, diamond, Netherite, bedrock, and copper.) crafting recipe is 3 planks, cobblestone, ingots, or upgrade in smithing table. one material in the 7th slot, one in the 9th slot, and 1 in the 5th one. Warden TNT deals 250 damage.

add jeb_ wool, carpets, beds, and banners, easels, pictures in written books from the book and quill item, dragon rises when killed just like in java in bedrock, cooked Steve food item (from meme when player head is smelted).

new game mechanics: naming a mob "PG-13" has it drop more than 12 of its items and XP, name any mob, including ender dragon etc.

new boss: copper snake (found in copper veins)

new mechanics: elytra trims, elytra is armor, horse/nautilus/wolf armor trims

new item: piglin debruter (craftable)

new totems: totem of dying, totem of unbinding (removes curse of binding), totem of unvanishing (removes curse of vanishing)

new blocks: vertical slabs, quarter blocks, seafoam glazed terracotta, seafoam terracotta, seafoam bed, seafoam Shulker box

new items: pig orb, bedrock shards, bedrock ingots, bedrock upgrade smithing template

new game mechanics: double ender chests, naming ender chests give it its own storage system and transfer system.
the maximum stack limit is 99, not 64 as of the next major update... 1.23: The Minecraft Revolution. THe update logo would be just revolution, and it would make sense if paired with Minecraft logo.

new blocks: mossy cobbled deepslate, mossy deepslate bricks (slab, stair, and wall variants available)

new mob: jaguar (behavior: neutral blocks tall: 1.3 abilities: pouncing tamable: yes, when tamed, you can give it belly rubs, and it purrs cute-ly. It gives you the Jaguar Omen effect, if you rub ten times without stopping for a single second.)
the JO effect is night vision + jump boost + resistance + strength.
you tame the new jaguar mob by feeding it warden torsos (dropped from the warden with silk touch sword or mace), and the jaguar mob drops echo shards.
when you eat 8 cookies in one go without your hunger bar going full before you finish all 8 cookies, you get slowness and weakness.
the unhealthy effect is "diabetes", as it is slowness + weakness, as Mojang put an effect based off medical conditions before, which is nausea.
Warden tnt animations have the warden torsos get eaten to dissapear before it detonates with sonic boom particles and explosions after 5, 4, 3, 2, 1.
add mushroom stem wood set
warden tnt breaks bedrock except from end gateways and the exit portal. make end gateway blocks in the creative inventory with end portal blocks and the exit portal.

new biome: lush peaks 

new game mechanic: warden torsos can be crafted out of 8 ghast tears and 1 echo shard, wardens run away from jaguars, jaguar mobs only spawn in jungle and lush peaks biomes.

retexture end crystals into 3D when held in main hand or put on shelves, maces into 3D when held in main hand or put on shelves, and the same goes for armor pieces. new move: long-jumping: press H and F8 to perform. Also retexture player head to look like Steve's head.
creepers flee from the new jaguar mob, like wardens do
release: June 21, 2026 (longest day of the year)

add closets to the game, crafted from an armor stand, 4 chests, and four wooden planks of any type including the new mushroom wood), and you can store armor and items with 8 storage containers and a built-in armor stand, it is 4 blocks tall and 4 blocks wide and 1-2 blocks long. It says "closet" when you open it, just like chests and furnaces. and the word "closet" can be translated if you go change language in settings and open it again.

all of the new biomes: ender jungle (end), glowstone forest (nether), heavy core deltas (nether), ender shores (end), lush peaks (overworld), gravel biome (overworld, has trees made of purpur pillars and glass).

all of the new mobs: pig wither, copper snake, jaguar, elephant, ender villager
do an animated trailer just like Village and Pillage, Nether Update, etc. It would be long. Do a Minecraft Live as well with a catchy song just like the Happy Ghast song.
the new elephant mob drops tusks, which are used to brew the potion of invulnerability, which makes you immune to negative effects like poison, wither, slowness, weakness, levitation, and darkness.
the jaguar mob has a chance to purr if you give it belly rubs. Not all the time.
put Rakxn's avatar in the catchy song as well
cats now drop cat meat (raw and cooked variants, textures are cat heads)
make Minecraft free-to-play to reduce targeting by piracy sites. You can now earn achievements with keep inventory, and keep inventory is no longer cheating, for younger or new players.

bedrock update smithing template: found in ancient cities 

totem of dying: found in nether fortress, inflicts darkness and wither effect

totem of unvanishing: found in woodland mansions (totem of undying was added before, drops from evokers)

totem of unbinding: found in buried treasure (note: multiple buried treasure chests spawn around the world)

anything can be enchanted with curse of vanishing, eyes of ender and totems can be enchanted with unbreaking, grindstones can be enchanted with curse removal, allowing the grindstone to remove curses.
you can enchant anything with an enchanted book with NO nbt, including all blocks and items.
copper snake oxidizes as it takes damage, wax piglins in overworld or end to prevent zombification, flattening tnt is only obtainable via commands and creative mode, just like spawn eggs
add bonus blocks, items, and mobs for the deep dark dimension (titled the otherside dimension, go there by activating the ancient city portal)
add the lace, crafted from light core (heavy core plus 8 feathers) and a blaze rod. the higher you fall, the less damage it deals, and it does 1000000 damage on the ground.
pig dimension has a seafoam sky while otherside dimension has an orange-yellow-green-blue sky, depending on the biome
pig dimension has a light seafoam sky I meant
add the moobloom and a new flat world preset: caves and cliffs (surface at y = 65, dirt from 64 to 60, stone from 59 to 0, deepslate from -1 to -63, and bedrock at -64.

add moobloom from Minecraft earth, add a new structure called the pig temple with the ancient pork relic used to hatch the endergragon egg to have a "happy ender dragon" mob like the "happy ghast" from earlier.
also include Banana73620 in the video
no lists
skulk armor, tools and tamable wardens

Also this version should probably be free in the Launcher if you've already bought Minecraft. It could probably be a chance to balance some weapons, mobs, mechanics, the enchanting system, villager tradings, the anvil's xp cost and give more use to things like lapis, amethyst, the sniffer, etc.

We desperately need a Sails update, as well as a minecart update to make both modes of travel more viable than simply making an ice highway in the nether

Im also having this issue and the most recent hotfix they released to try and fix it did absolutely nothing. Havent been able to play on my 6 year world since copper age came out.

I like the current frequency of game drops, I remember being very impatient for annual updates to come out.

But I agree with your point about updates being teased before the game drop currently in development is released. I think that the only change they should make is releasing game drops before Minecraft Live, so the feeling of excitement remains.

Is this a suggestion or admiration of the game?

If it's a suggestion, I disagree, that would put way too much pressure on the developers.

If it's admiration, I agree! I love what Mojang's been doing lately.
No. This would put way too much pressure on the developers and offer almost no time for playtesting. While I would like new content that often, it's just not realistic.

This would become an inconvenience later down the line if an update is worthy of the "2.0.0" name, but that's a non-issue.
we don't need that

In this world the dragon was peaceful but she was forced to protect her home dimension after so many player started attacking and reviving her over and over until one player who was different, Brian. He watched all the suffering Jean passed through and swore to protect her from players, his intervention cannot be seen all the time but Brian is always lurking and endermen are spies that help him accomplish that mission.

Now, how do you explain that Steve already have elytra? Simple. In this Minecraft version they could be craftable via mods or datapacks. Also, the reason to go to the end could be that they need end rods or smth.
Also make an exception for mobs that only exist during a spin-off game because of lore. (e. g. whisperers, the arch-illager, the hosts, etc.)
Please!!

stop NetEase agent Minecraft
I support it. Absolutely. I have expressed such an idea before. The authorities really should provide support.

I couldn't fit these last ideas in as well, so I am posting them as a comment:

Content creators could be accused of creating or encouraging this graphic content wrongfully, if it is allowed to be on youtube, it could cause parents to restrict their children from Minecraft Content; or even Minecraft as a whole, if they believe that this content is acceptable by Youtube or Microsoft and Mojang.

Speaking of takedowns, Microsoft and Mojang have been recently taking down videos promoting illegal copies and hacked clients using AI. Why not sift through the explicit content as well? (There are accusations against Youtube of allowing this content because it makes them money, while it harms children, content creators, Minecraft, Mojang, and Microsoft, as well as Youtube itself utimately.) 

I believe that this AI should actually be used to temporarily close videos that have been reported enough times for any reason, until they can be reviewed to see if it breaks Youtube and Microsoft standards. False reporting should be penalized by users being temporarily or permenantely restricted from reporting videos. This would prevent videos from being taken down for no legitimate reason (as has been happening), and it would protect content creators from getting a strike (potentially leading to the channel takedown).

Last and final quick though, explicit content on youtube kids should immediately give the channel three strikes if proven to have been targeted to children.
Perfect. Bless you for that.
i agree
